name: The Thing Beneath the Waves
description:
A frigate crashed against a reef a week ago, carrying classified cargo.  Gather it quickly, before the waves take you.

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look
  • Left Click to Grab
  • Esc to quit.

Created for the tenth Scream Zone Game Jam - Spooky Seas, where the theme was adrift.

Some audio from OpenGameArt.org, all others custom or stock Unreal Engine content.
